name: Adventures of Xanderbop
description:
The Adventures of Xanderbop This is a prototype for the Game Dev Knock Out competition. Game was made in 2 weeks and the Challenge was to make a one button game with Audio that fits the game. Not a full game.  For more information: https://itch.io/jam/gdko-round-6 Game Lore

Due to goverment isolationist policies and the predictable resulting labour shortage, the retirement age has been been scrapped. Pentioners are being drafted back into industrial complexes and equiped with W.A.L.K. (Working Age Lengthening Kinematics) Gear to enhance performace (/stave off the inevitable).

One such facility is the XanderWood™ wood manufacturing plant (leading producer of Boxes, Barrels and Buckets) and Berryl,  Ophelia and Pam (collectively known as the BOP) have had enough!

They must use their W.A.L.K. gear and the limited time they have left to escape the industrial complex and make it to safety. Will they make it? Probably not....

Controls

Space that is all....

  • Space to start
  • Space to jump
  • Hold space to switch character (when the switch bar is full)
  • (ESC and mouse or WASD to navigate pause menu)
Dev stuff
  • This game is made using Unity and Corgi Engine by Reuno
  • Art is by yanniboi (first time making game art)
  • Music is by yanniboi (also first time making game music)
  • Art "inspiration" by Xanderwood's Coin Block Bash (https://xanderwood.itch.io/coin-block-bash)
